---
title: Collapse 折叠面板
---


## 基本用法
> 折叠面板用于显示和隐藏内容。

```jsx
<Collapse 
    title="This is Collapse title 1"
    content="This is Collapse content 1"
/>
```

<Collapse 
    title="This is Collapse title 1"
    content="This is Collapse content 1"
/>



### 带焦点的折叠

> 你可以使用 `focus`, 当展开的折叠面板失去焦点时，将自动关闭。

```jsx
<Collapse  
    focus
    title="This is Collapse title 2（focus）"
    content="This is Collapse content 2（focus）"
/>
```

<Collapse 
    focus
    title="This is Collapse title 2（focus）"
    content="This is Collapse content 2（focus）"
/>


### 边框和背景

> 你可以通过 `bordered` 快捷设置外层边框。<br />
> 背景色可以通过 `classes.container` 来进行自定义。

```jsx
<Collapse  
    bordered
    showIcon
    title="This is Collapse title (bordered & classes)"
    content="This is Collapse content (bordered & classes)"
    classes={{
        container: "bg-transparent"
    }}
/>
```
<Collapse 
    bordered
    showIcon
    title="This is Collapse title (bordered & classes)"
    content="This is Collapse content (bordered & classes)"
    classes={{
        container: "bg-transparent"
    }}
/>



### 使用图标
> 你可以通过 `showIcon` 展示 Panel 组件的箭头图标。<br />
> 当 `showIcon=true` 时，默认值使用 `collapse-arrow`。 其他 icon 目前有 `collapse-plus`。

```jsx
<Collapse  
    showIcon={true}
    title="This is Collapse title, showIcon=true"
    content="This is Collapse content, showIcon=true"
/>

<Collapse  
    showIcon="collapse-arrow"
    title="This is Collapse title, showIcon=collapse-arrow"
    content="This is Collapse content, showIcon=collapse-arrow"
/>

<Collapse  
    showIcon="collapse-plus"
    title="This is Collapse title, showIcon=collapse-plus"
    content="This is Collapse content, showIcon=collapse-plus"
/>
```

<Collapse  
    showIcon={true}
    title="This is Collapse title, showIcon=true"
    content="This is Collapse content, showIcon=true"
/>

<Collapse  
    showIcon="collapse-arrow"
    title="This is Collapse title, showIcon=collapse-arrow"
    content="This is Collapse content, showIcon=collapse-arrow"
/>

<Collapse  
    showIcon="collapse-plus"
    title="This is Collapse title, showIcon=collapse-plus"
    content="This is Collapse content, showIcon=collapse-plus"
/>


## API

### Accordion

| 属性       | 说明                  | 类型    | 默认值 |
| --------  | --------------------  | ------- | ----- |
| title     | 折叠面板标题部分         | string  |  ""   |    
| content   | 折叠面板内容部分         |  string  |  ""   |    
| focus     | 折叠面板使用获取焦点模式   |  boolean  |  false   |    
| bordered  | 快捷设置折叠面板的边框     |  boolean  |  false   |    
| classes  | 作用于 Collapse 的样式 | Collapse.classes    |  -   |
| showIcon  | 是否展示当前面板上的 Icon，可选值有 `collapse-arrow` `collapse-plus`。 <br />当`showIcon=true`时，默认使用 `collapse-arrow` | boolean &#124;&#124; string    |  "collapse-arrow"   |


### Collapse.classes
| 属性       | 说明                  | 类型    | 默认值 |
| --------   | -------------------- | ------- | ----------- |
| container  | 最外层元素样式           | string     |  ""   |    
| title      |  作用于 Collapse 标题区域的样式 | string  | -    |
| content    | 作用于 Collapse 内容区域的样式 | string  | -    |
